channel.title: [WIP]Medievil fight scene[C4D]
channel.description:
Ok, I started today and this is what ive got so far: [IMG]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/3972/c4dbridgept1ly7.jpg[/img] This is the basic scene so far, I hope to add much more to it, animating it will be hard, but the outcome will rock :)
Stage 2: [IMG]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/7942/c4dbridgept2vi7.jpg[/img]

item.title: [WIP]Medievil fight scene[C4D]
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

On another topic

I don’t excactly deserve one though do I? So how can i be mad. I’m obviously mad because an inactive person gets one.

But the difference is that STH is exceptional at graphics, and you’re not producing works of the same caliber as his. The award is for graphics skill, not activity.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP]Medievil fight scene[C4D]
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:11, topic:142317”]WHOAH I didn’t even notice =]
thanks.

Well if you don’t know how to animate, how are you going to do it?
I’m not being rude.
I can help you if you need help.[/quote]

Thanks SomethingToHide, I was thinking of getting my friend george to animate it with 3dsMax, but ill do it with help

item.title: [WIP]Medievil fight scene[C4D]
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:9, topic:142317”][quote author=exps35 link=topic=194744.msg1753253#msg1753253 date=1189668932]

HAHAHAHAHAHAH

what the fuck.
seriously.

I though the same thing…
but didn’t have the balls to say it :o

Lets be nice here, and just say that you should really look into some tuts. On anything. Learn to model some simple things, and how creating boxes isn’t the true way to lay out a scene.
[/quote]

I was talking about the weird comments people were saying.

But on that note. Yeah boxes don’t cut it. But if you like em that much, try box modeling.
I’m just saying, that scene doesn’t seem like something that someone who’s making a kickass medieval animation would make.

Do you know how to make the animation.?[/quote]

Nope lol, and gratz on graphic cup

Read full topic
